sentences.english: A software company might give bonuses to programmers who create the fewest bugs .
sentences.chinese: 一個軟件公司可以加發獎勵給寫出最少臭蟲的程序員。

sentences.english: In assembly language, this is handled explicitly by the programmer.
sentences.chinese: 而在彙編語言中，卻需要程序員來顯式處理。

sentences.english: That means programmers have to keep track or recompute how much space is left all the time.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着程序員必須始終跟蹤或重新計算剩餘的空間。

sentences.english: Many programmers use these two terms, parameters and arguments, as synonyms.
sentences.chinese: 很多程序員把這兩個術語視爲同義字。

sentences.english: They are intended to convey information about the program to other programmers.
sentences.chinese: 一般用來告訴其他程序員有關這段程序的信息。

sentences.english: Satisfying security requirements without hamstringing programmers.
sentences.chinese: 無需程序員即可滿足安全需求。

sentences.english: Multicasting requires some more coding and programmers are lazy to even look into it.
sentences.chinese: 多播需求更多甚至連程序員都懶得瀏覽檢驗的代碼。

sentences.english: Programmer Paul Newell is responsible for building the rigs to McNally's specifications.
sentences.chinese: 程序員保羅尼維爾負責麥克納利的特效編寫程序。

sentences.english: Work on projects after other programmers.
sentences.chinese: 接手別的程序員完成項目。

sentences.english: John was a superstar, a one in a million programmer.
sentences.chinese: 約翰是一百萬的程序員中的佼佼者，超級明星。

sentences.english: They sent the programmers to demonstrate how to do and then ask us to practice.
sentences.chinese: 他們會派程序員來演示如何使用軟件並讓我們練習。

sentences.english: A library package is a collection of tools written by other programmers that perform specific operations.
sentences.chinese: 庫包是其他程序員所寫的用來完成特定功能的工具集。

sentences.english: Scope memory areas can be created and destroyed under programmer control.
sentences.chinese: 程序員可以控制作用域內存區域的創建和銷燬。

sentences.english: Angry to fly, throw department news of department all at programmer, if the gull enters the beach.
sentences.chinese: 怒而飛，投司部之訊於程序員衆，若鷗入灘。

sentences.english: Even when the economy is bad there is a shortage of good programmers.
sentences.chinese: 即使在經濟不好的情況下，好的程序員總是缺少的。

sentences.english: I'm going to be a computer programmer. [03:48.41]1.I am going to work tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我要做一名電腦程序員。

definition: to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
to be absent-minded/to desert/to abscond from the army/absent without leave (AWOL)
replacement guaranteed if not genuine/fig. authentic
to talk endlessly on the phone
at leisure/idle/to have nothing to do
crow's beak/(fig.) person who makes an inauspicious remark
to undermine/to let someone down/to seduce someone away from something
to go round and round/running around in circles/fig. frantically busy
